name: Ngrok Usage with Remote Desktop Service
description: Detects cases in which ngrok, a reverse proxy tool, forwards events to the local RDP port, which could be a sign of malicious behaviour
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-TerminalServices\-LocalSessionManager\/Operational AND event.code:21 AND Address:*16777216*)`
